title: Slate's Spoiler Specials: Music and Lyrics
description:
Slate's film critic Dana Stevens and music critic Jody Rosen discuss Music and Lyrics, starring Hugh Grant and Drew Barrymore. WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie.
        

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
